attributes.action: hold a referendum for an independant England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the introduction of the Scottish Parliament and the Assemblies in Wales and Northern Ireland Westminster is becoming less and less relevant and it is time to give England a voice if it's own.
England demands a parliament of it's own- to replace not supplement Westminster.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
